alert.note: Alert for Dawson; Eastern Roosevelt; McCone; Prairie; Richland; Wibaux (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 23 at 7:55PM MDT until April 24 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM MDT SUNDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions. Additional snow accumulations of 4 to 10. Winds from the north at 30 to 45 mph gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Montana from Culbertson to Circle to Terry and eastward across the North Dakota Border. * WHEN...Until 6 AM MDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Widespread blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches. Many people are without power and it will take crews some time to assemble and safely be able to venture out to do repairs. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...many highways are closed in the region. Please check the Montana road map before venturing out. Stay home until daylight and things clear up if you can.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
